Articles.Content:
Career friendly Duna explorer ship. Efficient design. Lots of snacks and a teeny tiny probe lander for the more peculiarly minded space explorers.

Happy launchings.

Cryogenic engines pack is the only mod you need for this craft.

More in depth description in the link below.

see Duna Explorer Mk1 on KerbalX.com
Very neat design and cost effective too i like it
Thank you! Everything worked perfectly from the first try on my stream the other day. Check back in a few minutes, I'm uploading my craft from yesterday's mission to Dres Stay tuned!
